newsitem.title: UK: Dated Brent trades at weaker Oct Brent-48 cents.
newsitem.headline: Dated Brent trades at weaker Oct Brent-48 cents.

text.p: North Sea benchmark Dated Brent traded Friday at a wider discount to prompt forward paper as end September and early October barrels continued to weigh heavily, traders said.
A trader sold a Sept 28-30 Brent cargo to a U.K. refiner at Oct Brent less 48 cents a barrel. The last reported deal was a Sept 25-27 Brent at Oct Brent less 43.5 cents on Wednesday.
"There are still two or three left at the end of the month and then you have the early October barrels," said a trader.
Five cargoes were due to turn wet on Friday, traders said.
